Notes

If the erroneous rating decision has not been promulgated, pulling the record back into the Veterans Benefits Management System - Rating (VBMS-R) anew will overwrite the former, errant decision.
If the underlying end product is improperly cleared before the non-promulgated rating decision can be corrected, follow the guidance in
M21-1, Part II, Subpart ii, 2.A.2.b

Note

Due process procedures under
38 CFR 3.103
may apply where correction of an error in a rating decision would constitute an adverse action.
